hero.title: Make your way to your dream job!
hero.subtitle: WWH. can help you get there...

divider: Look the Opportunities, Explore our solutions!

highlights.text: Choose where you want to work on
Live for new and exciting experiences
Explore paths that lead to your dreams and goals

places.description: Relocating for work offers access to broader job markets, top companies, and new career opportunities. It’s a chance to build skills, expand your network, and gain valuable international experience, making you more competitive in the job market.

Beyond work, finding your perfect occupation can make you experience new lifestyles, and perspectives. It fosters personal growth, resilience, and adaptability while creating exciting memories and opportunities for meaningful connections.

slides.title: Construction Work
slides.description: The high demand for skilled labor in the construction industry values workers for their expertise and dedication.

slides.title: Cleaning Services
slides.description: The growing demand for reliable cleaning services in the U.S. looks for workers with endurance and strong work ethic.

slides.title: Landscaping and Gardening
slides.description: The landscaping industry appreciates workers for their creativity and ability to handle physical tasks outdoors.

slides.title: Food Service and Hospitality
slides.description: Restaurants and hotels value workers for their adaptability, customer service skills, and teamwork.

slides.title: Warehouse and Logistics
slides.description: The logistics sector seeks workers who are efficient, organized, and comfortable in fast-paced environments.

slides.title: Retail and Customer Service
slides.description: Retail businesses value employees for their communication skills and ability to connect with customers.

slides.title: Home Health Care
slides.description: The growing need for home health aides emphasizes compassion, reliability, and attention to detail.

slides.title: Childcare Services
slides.description: Parents value caregivers who are patient, responsible, and great with children.

slides.title: Transportation and Delivery
slides.description: Delivery services appreciate workers for their punctuality and ability to navigate efficiently.

slides.title: Agricultural Work
slides.description: Farms seek workers who are hardworking, consistent, and capable of handling seasonal demands.

elements.title: Job Prospecting
elements.description: Using our best techniques of job prospecting, we can help you find the best opportunities in the market.

elements.title: Time Organization
elements.description: Our team will organize all your work schedule for you, giving you time to focus on what you do best.

elements.title: Account Management
elements.description: By letting us manage your various job network accounts, you will maximize your chances of getting your job.

elements.title: Ongoing Support
elements.description: We provide continuous assistance to address your concerns and ensure your professional success in the long term.

elements.title: Alex Martins
elements.subtitle: Construction Worker
elements.description: After 1 year of moving to America, he was able to find his first job to give a better life for his kids.

elements.title: Luísa Alves
elements.subtitle: Nurse Assistant
elements.description: Found a stable job in the healthcare industry and is now supporting her family and pursuing her dreams.

elements.title: Carlos Mota
elements.subtitle: Truck Driver
elements.description: Transitioned to a new career in logistics, enabling him to secure financial stability for his loved ones.

elements.title: Marcos Totti
elements.subtitle: Chef
elements.description: Started a career in a renowned restaurant, showcasing his culinary talent and building a brighter future.
